about-me.headline: About me
about-me.sub-text: I’m a passionate frontend developer specializing in Angular. My goal is to build modern, high-performance, and user-friendly web applications. I love solving complex challenges, and continuously expanding my knowledge. Let’s build amazing applications together!
about-me.table-text1: I'm from Donaueschingen and open to relocating for an exciting job opportunity. At the same time, I highly value remote work and the flexibility it offers.
about-me.table-text2: I'm open-minded and flexible, able to adapt to various situations with ease. I love learning new things and continuously expanding my skills to stay ahead

my-skills.headline: My skills
my-skills.sub-text: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
my-skills.contact: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding my previous knowledge.

portfolio.tagline: Explore a selection of my work here - check out these projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio.join: Join – A powerful project management tool that helps you organize teams and projects efficiently. With features like Kanban boards, task distribution, and progress tracking, it enables you to manage projects from start to finish, promote collaboration, and meet deadlines.
portfolio.el-pollo-loco: El Pollo Loco – Help Pepe Peligroso navigate a wild world of chickens to face the ultimate boss: Don Pollo Supremo, the giant chicken! Dodge enemies and defeat the big bad chicken to survive!
portfolio.pokedex: Based on the PokéAPI - a simple library that provides and catalogues pokémon information.

reference.text1: bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla english

contact.text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work. Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
contact.privacy: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
